long_description: This Pedro's micrometer-style torque wrench from Pedro's offers precision control for high-end fasteners. Makes an audible "click" when one reaches the desired torque setting on the handle. Chrome vanadium ratchet gear and head, and 1/4 in. drive are heat treated for durability. Torque wrench is adjustable from 26 - 133 inch-lbs. and is accurate to within +/- 4%. Suitable for daily professional use.
short_description: This Pedro's micrometer-style torque wrench from Pedro's offers precision control for high-end fasteners.
